entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong behavior of compiling for functions with nullable string return when nullable is enabled #62115
  • 'Converted to interpolated string' supports InvariantCulture #62111
  • Create Implementation Shortcut in right menu for Interface #62110
  • Integration tests should clearly indicate "failure to save" #62109
  • c# improve error messages UI #62108
  • Quick Refactoring - Introduce Parameter Object #62106
  • Diagnostics Inline: Show Hints, Suggestions, Refactorings, Spelling Errors #62105
  • Close release branches when official build is failing #62099
    Compiler.Next
  • Allow ref field of the containing type #62098
  • Various diagnostics that reference parameters do not include the parameter name #62096
  • References within `out` parameter should not be considered as potentially escaping #62094
  • "Implement abstract class" should add "where T : default" when a parameter is covariant in T? #62092
  • Redundant recompilation of source code due to file path case sensitivity. #62097

Closed

  • Intellisense should display construction hints for aggregate initiliazer #62107
  • further simplification of switch() syntax c# #62112

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE
  • Allow `delegate*<...>? ` to be scanned/parsed and add diagnostic to binder #62104
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix top-level activation for Move Static Members #62103
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Issue/50181 #62101
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid intermediary array allocation in incremental generator #62100
    Area-Compilers
  • testing out caching common binary assets #62095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Minor lazy diagnostic info refactoring #62091
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Updated

  • Add members to PythiaCompletionProviderBase to move IntelliCode off internal APIs #62118
    Area-IDE
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid intermediary allocation in Incremental Driver #62089
    Area-Compilers
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust spec quotes in ConversionBase.AddTypesParticipatingInUserDefinedConversion to incorporate abstract statics in interfaces #62076
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Address comments referencing work items in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert 61669 62019 #62081
    Area-IDE
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Standardize references to the UTF-8 term in code and comments/documentation #62074
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't load parts early from MEF that aren't needed #62090
    Area-IDE
  • Remove crash workaround in `.editorconfig` #60535
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Introduce variable rvalue fix #45918
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
